game_description: Looking for the best latest VR movies？VeeR have them all. What is special about VeeR: • PREMIUM TITLES: VR movies from award-winning studios and latest film festival line-ups • FRESH EXPERIENCES CURATED WEEKLY: We've got interactive movies, animations, Sci-Fi, travel & documentaries and so much more • HEAD-TRACKED SUBTITLES: Enjoy titles all around the world with English captions • ONLINE STREAMING & OFFLINE WATCHING up to 4K • VEER VR MOBILE APP: With the mobile companion app, available on iOS & Android, you can preview and bookmark titles during your commute or break time and watch later in a VR headset. Download VeeR now and start watching! If you like VeeR, please rate us and leave a review. *Any feedback or problems? Reply within 48 hours: support@veer.tv *Follow us and stay tuned for new titles: Facebook: @letsveer Twitter: @letsveer
review_1: I really wish they had alot more 360 pictures instead of just videos, but I think you can still kinda search for them.
review_2: One of the best content-focussed apps for experiencing a wide range of VR media including 3D-180 and 3D-360 content..
review_3: Many good videos and experiences even without an account!
